EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ENTIRE FACILITY

Institutional Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA772PR - Proprietary Institutional Control. This instutional control is an environmental covenant with VADEQ, and is available at:

Environmental Covenant

CA772EP - Enforcement and Permit Tools. This institutional control is the facility's hazardous waste management permit.

Engineering Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA770GW - Groundwater engineering control. This engineering control consists of groundwater monitoring wells for long-terrm monitoring.
